title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress has a perfect fit, particularly noting its length below the knee, and appreciate its comfort, quality, and softness. They like its appearance, color, and warmth, with one customer mentioning it's perfect for their fair skin tone. However, several customers note that the material is thinner than expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I bought!
items.body: This dress was definitely a win for the sale price. I am typically a small but sized up to a medium and it fit perfectly. It's so cute for work and church. The material is not the thickest, but it will keep me warm enough in fall. The color is just lovely, and perfect for my fair skin tone. I also just washed it for the first time, and was very impressed with how well it washed. (I washed on delicate with like colors, cold water, and hung to dry.) It's comfortable, cute, and definitely better quality than I expected. Read more
items.author: Gracenotes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Family photos dress
items.body: I truly loved this dress and people can’t believe it’s from amazon! It’s so so soft and the color is gorgeous. The length is lovely on me as I’m 5’9” and really self conscious about the length of dresses. Wore this for my fall family photos and it looked great! Read more
items.author: Marissa Dumford

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Long sleeve midi dress
items.body: Brown long sleeve midi dress size xl material is thin if you hold to light you can see thru. Will need a slip under. The quality is fair. The fit was true to size. length below knee. Does have pockets which is nice. Does have stretch and comfortably soft. Would not purchase again because of material. My personal preference! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Love this dress! Fits really well, very comfortable and warm! Goes great with a pair of boots. Runs small. I normally wear a size small but had to get a medium so it wouldn't be too tight (5'2" 120 lbs size M) Read more
items.author: Cindi Wall

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wish it was thicker and warmer.
items.body: Incredibly thin and cheap fabric. Didn't keep me warm at all. Looks great, though, especially the burgundy. I got several compliments. Fit me well, and I was pleasantly surprised by the pockets. Read more
items.author: Anne F.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars I don’t feel like this dress is worth it’s price!
items.body: It was soft the first wear, very comfy.. but after washing.. no more softness. I wash my dresses in a mesh zip laundry bag on cold/delicate cycle of washer. I dried it laying flat on my drying rack. Also this dress is thin! I had to buy a skirt to wear under it, the tan color is see through in light. If I’d seen it’s lack of quality in person I don’t think I’d have purchased this for anything more than $20. The $42 I’d paid is too much! I was expecting better for the price. It has so much possible potential.. disappointing really. Best part about it, is it has pickets.. for however long it lasts.. Read more
items.author: Happy Mom of 6

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Fits as expected, comfortable fabric Read more
items.author: Terri C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Lovely dress! Feels soft, is warm, though not heavy. I liked the first one I bought so much, I bought this green one too! It's a beautiful muted green, perfect for the fall and holiday season Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Blue, Purple, Burgundy, Burnt Orange, Black, Navy Blue, Green, Grey, Light Khaki, Dark Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
